version_description: We've made some behind the scenes improvements this time around. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make the app faster, safer and more reliable.
We've made some behind the scenes improvements this time around. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make the app faster, safer and more reliable.
We've made some behind the scenes improvements this time around. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make the app faster, safer and more reliable.
We've made some behind the scenes improvements this time around. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make the app faster, safer and more reliable.
We've made some behind the scenes improvements this time around. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make the app faster, safer and more reliable.

We've rebuilt Pockit LOQBOX to give it a great new look and make it easier to start improving your credit score!
In response to your feedback we've made loads of other great changes!
- Pockit now looks better on devices with smaller screens
- Account balance and recent transactions now load faster
- It's now quicker and easier to get an account
- Better stability even if you lose network access
- Loads of other great improvements and bug fixes to make the app faster, safer and more reliable
We've made some behind the scenes improvements this time around. You might not be able to see any obvious changes, but these tweaks help make the app faster, safer and more reliable.

It's never been easier to verify your identity and get an account with Pockit. We now accept Birth certificates directly via the app along with a wide range of proof of address documents. Whatever ID and documents you have, we will always work with you to get you a fully verified Pockit account.

Hate remembering passwords? We feel your pain, so we introduced Magic links to make it even easier to open a Pockit account!

Lastly, we’ve fixed loads of bugs to make using the app better.
We fixed an issue with sending money from your Pockit account. Please update to this latest version of the Pockit app to continue sending money from your Pockit account.

Introducing new and improved transactional view, that makes it much easier to recognise all your transactions in your Pockit app.

We’ve also fixed loads of bugs to make using the app better.
In this release we focused on the internal improvements and bug fixes, so you won't notice any other changes.
In this release we focused on the internal improvements and bug fixes, so you won't notice any other changes.
In this release we focused on the internal improvements and bug fixes, so you won't notice any other changes.

Helping you make online transfers safer.

Now when you pay someone through the app, make sure you enter their full name and account details to avoid delays with your transfer.

We’ve also fixed loads of bugs to make using the app better.

Helping you make online transfers safer.

Now when you pay someone through the app, make sure you enter their full name and account details to avoid delays with your transfer.

We’ve also fixed loads of bugs to make using the app better.
In this release we focused on the internal improvements and bug fixes, so you won't notice any other changes.
In this release we focused on the internal improvements and bug fixes, so you won't notice any other changes.
If you’re new to Pockit you’re now able to add money to your account via a debit card.
If you’re new to Pockit you’re now able to add money to your account via a debit card.

The best version of Pockit yet.

Now you can see when your balance was last updated.

Also, we've fixed bugs affecting additional cards.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

Soon, we'll need to text you to sign in. This is to keep your account safe.

Next time you log in we will prompt you if we need to double check your phone number.

You won't be able to access your Pockit account if we don't have your valid phone number.

Also, we've fixed a few bugs.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

We made it easier for you to stay on top of your money: now you can see all your transactions on the main screen of your Pockit app.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

Next time you sign in we'll ask you to enter a one-time code that we’ll send you by SMS.

To protect yourself against fraud and scams never share your code with anyone.

Also, we've fixed a bug affecting users on iOS 12.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

Introducing the new and improved UK transfers! It was rebuilt from the ground up to make the process as easy and quick as possible.

Also, next time you sign in we'll ask you to enter a one-time code that we’ll send you by SMS. To protect yourself against fraud and scams never share your code with anyone.

To check your phone number is up to date tap “Account” and then Profile tab.

You won't be able to access your Pockit account if we don't have your valid phone number.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

Introducing the new and improved Card activation! It was rebuilt from the ground up to make the process as easy and quick as possible.

Also, next time you sign in we'll ask you to enter a one-time code that we’ll send you by SMS.

To check your phone number is up to date tap “Account” and then Profile tab.

You won't be able to access your Pockit account if we don't have your valid phone number.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

Introducing the new and improved Pockit Direct Debit! Manage your Direct Debits payments quickly and easily straight from the Pockit app.

Also, next time you sign in we'll ask you to enter a one-time code that we’ll send you by SMS.

To check your phone number is up to date tap “Account” and then Profile tab.

You won't be able to access your Pockit account if we don't have your valid phone number.

We’ve also fixed a bug that prevented you from seeing the nearest PayPoint stores on iOS 14.

Enjoy!

The best version of Pockit yet.

Introducing the new and improved Pockit Direct Debit! Manage your Direct Debits payments quickly and easily straight from the Pockit app.

Also, next time you sign in we'll ask you to enter a one-time code that we’ll send you by SMS.

To check your phone number is up to date tap “Account” and then Profile tab.

You won't be able to access your Pockit account if we don't have your valid phone number.

We’ve also fixed a bug that prevented you from seeing the nearest PayPoint stores on iOS 14.

Enjoy!
